about_the_game:
Explore the mysterious Aztec Jungle wilderness with this jungle tileset for RPG Maker!

The Aztec Jungle Tileset Includes:

Ground tiles:

Water tiles in multiple colors, plus lava, overgrown grass, dark grass, sand and stone tiles, table and fence edges, spikes, pits, rocks, decorative edge and vines for the walls!

Walls:

Five types of natural rock and sandy walls, plus two patterned tiles, rock wall, brick wall, plain painted walls (tan, red, teal, blue-gray), colorful wall stripes (tan, red, teal, blue-gray), decorative colorful wall in 5 styles, natural straw texture and more!

Plenty of plants to build up the landscape:

palm trees
yucca
lots of vines
scrub grass
high weeds
and lots of moss-covered rocks!


We have village-building tiles too:

stairs (to match floor patterns)
windows (lit and unlit)
hanging laundry
beds
fireplace
decorative edging
bridges
tubs and sinks
straw beds
straw and straw decor objects
baskets of fruit and vegetables, with plants to make a garden)
weapons, shields and tools
headdress and clothing
and more!


Don't forget about that ancient temple:

grand entry
pillars
lots of statues
wall sculptures
decorative pots
and a fancy Aztec sun disc!


And some extra tiles to make your maps shinier:

rounded edges for grass and rocks to make more natural landscapes
shining light/faded dark for doors, windows, etc
pillar lights and spotlights
shadow edges of various kinds
lit edges as well!


Events and Animations:

Fire animations
Canoe and raft
Treasure Chest
Fruits and veggies (with growth stages)


Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
